text: ki aur (ai rasool jis tarah ye kuphfaar tumhaare dushman hain) usee tarah (goya hamane khud aazamaish ke lie shareer aadamiyon aur jinon ko har nabee ka dushman banaaya vah log ek doosare ko phareb dene kee garaz se chikanee chupadee baaton kee saragoshee karate hain aur agar tumhaara paravaradigaar chaahata to ye log) aisee harakat karane na paate
